mapper.select: select ProId, CorpId, ProDate, ProType, GoodsName, Unit, Type, Numbe, Price, TotalAmount, ApplicantId, ApplicationDeptId, ProDesc, Reviewer, ReviewerDesc, AcceptorId, FileinfoId, Status, CreateDate, ModifyDate from tdkjoa.procurement where ProId = #{proid}

select ProId, CorpId, ProDate, ProType, GoodsName, Unit, Type, Numbe, Price, TotalAmount, ApplicantId, ApplicationDeptId, ProDesc, Reviewer, ReviewerDesc, AcceptorId, FileinfoId, Status, CreateDate, ModifyDate from tdkjoa.procurement limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into tdkjoa.procurement(CorpId, ProDate, ProType, GoodsName, Unit, Type, Numbe, Price, TotalAmount, ApplicantId, ApplicationDeptId, ProDesc, Reviewer, ReviewerDesc, AcceptorId, FileinfoId, Status, CreateDate, ModifyDate) values (#{corpid}, #{prodate}, #{protype}, #{goodsname}, #{unit}, #{type}, #{numbe}, #{price}, #{totalamount}, #{applicantid}, #{applicationdeptid}, #{prodesc}, #{reviewer}, #{reviewerdesc}, #{acceptorid}, #{fileinfoid}, #{status}, #{createdate}, #{modifydate})
mapper.update:
update tdkjoa.procurement
CorpId = #{corpid},
ProDate = #{prodate},
ProType = #{protype},
GoodsName = #{goodsname},
Unit = #{unit},
Type = #{type},
Numbe = #{numbe},
Price = #{price},
TotalAmount = #{totalamount},
ApplicantId = #{applicantid},
ApplicationDeptId = #{applicationdeptid},
ProDesc = #{prodesc},
Reviewer = #{reviewer},
ReviewerDesc = #{reviewerdesc},
AcceptorId = #{acceptorid},
FileinfoId = #{fileinfoid},
Status = #{status},
CreateDate = #{createdate},
ModifyDate = #{modifydate},
where ProId = #{proid}
